dct_title_s: An improved map of the United States
dct_description_sm: Borders contain tables of distance on the Great Post Road from Pasamaquoddy (ME) to St. Mary's (GA), on the Post Road from Albany (NY) to Montreal ; also population and products of states.; Engravings of U.S. Naval vessels in Atlantic ocean section.
